bibl.title: Ten Greek Papyri from Cairo Museum.
bibl.note: 1. P. Cair. Inv. 10389. Fragment of a contract of sale. Pathyrite nome, 113-112 B.C.? - 2. Inv. 10353. Fragment of an agreement for the surety of sale. Crocodilopolis (Gebelen), ca. 107-98 B.C.? - 3. Inv. 10385. A small fragment. Pathyrite nome?, ca. 107-98 B.C.? - 4. Inv. 10358. Fragment of a contract of sale. Idem, ca. 109-98 B.C.? - 5. Inv. 10355. A fragment from the archive of Dryton. Idem, ca. 114-111 B.C.? [Also published as: P. Dryton 47.] - 6. Inv. 10365. Fragment of an unknown agreement. Idem, later half of the 2nd cent. B.C.? - 7. Inv. 10390. Fragment of a loan of wheat. Idem?, idem. - 8. Inv. 10298. Fragment of a private letter. Gurob (Fayoum), ca. 3rd cent B.C.? - 9. Inv. 10583. Fragment of an unknown contract. Provenance unknown, A.D. 166-167 or 198-199? - 10. Inv. 10685. Fragment of a petition to the strategos. Diopolite Parva, ca. A.D. 222-235. - [L'article est difficilement utilisable en raison du nombre de fautes d'impression. Le volume reçu est accompagné d'une photocopie du manuscrit de l'auteur.]
bibl.seg: BELAL ABOU EL ALA, Ten Greek Papyri from Cairo Museum.
BACPS 23 (2006 [2008]) pp. 23-119, 3 tabl., 1 arbre généal., 10 pll.

1. P. Cair. Inv. 10389. Fragment of a contract of sale. Pathyrite nome, 113-112 B.C.? - 2. Inv. 10353. Fragment of an agreement for the surety of sale. Crocodilopolis (Gebelen), ca. 107-98 B.C.? - 3.
